body.name: ZealSound USB Microphone,Condenser Computer PC Mic,Plug&Play Gaming Microphones for PS 4&5.Headphone Output&Volume Control,Mic Gain Control,Mute Button Vocal,YouTube Podcast on Mac&Windows(Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 17 hrs 22 mins
features: 【Easy Plug&Play Setup】 This USB gaming microphone for computer is ready to use with Computer, Laptop, PC, Windows, Mac OS, PS4, and PS5 right out of the box. Connect it easily to your iPhone, Type C Phone, iPad, or Android Tablet using the included USB IPHONE ADAPTER and Type C to USB adapter.Additional setup steps are unnecessary with this plug-and-play solution. It's simple to start creating video content and engage with platforms like YouTube, Instagram, Zoom, TikTok, Twitch, and podcasting.

【Precise Mic Gain Control】Enhance your recording experience with the professional gain knob. Easily adjust the microphone volume and sensitivity to achieve optimal sound quality. Dial the gain down to effectively minimize room noise pickup, and turn it counter-clockwise for increased sensitivity. The Echo function can be adjusted using the dedicated level control and deactivated as desired. The LED mute reminder ensures you never forget to unmute yourself during important moments.

【Superb Sound Quality】This microphone ensures exceptional audio quality, delivering crystal-clear and well-balanced reproduction across a wide frequency response. It can handle high sound pressure levels (SPLs) without distortion, providing detailed and faithful sound for both studio and on-the-go use. With its Cardioid polar pattern, it minimizes background noise and offers excellent feedback control. The built-in noise-canceling chipset ensures pristine and accurate capture of your voice.

【Live Monitoring】This podcast mic offers direct, latency-free monitoring via a 3.5mm headphone jack. Adjust the desired monitoring level using the volume control, whether you're gaming, recording content for TikTok, YouTube, Zoom, or Facebook live streams. With this microphone for your computer and iPhone, you can achieve an optimal volume level, capture background sounds perfectly for your film, and ensure error-free audio recording.

【360-Degree Rotatable Top-Addressed Microphone】This microphone for iPhone is designed to be top-addressed, meaning that you should position it with the top of the microphone facing towards the sound source during use. For optimal sound quality, it's important to speak directly into the top of the microphone. The microphone is equipped with a 360-degree rotation feature, allowing you to adjust its position as needed. Moreover, its robust metal base improves stability.

【Included Accessory Package】1 x Solid built metal construction and anti-vibration stand base (avoid moving); 1 x Durable and professional-grade k66 series black microphone; 1 x 70.87 inch USB Audio Cable; 1 x Type C Adapter for compatibility with the newest MacBook and other Type C devices (phones, tablets, and PCs); 1 x USB Adapter for iPhone and iPad; 1 x Microphone Foam Windscreen; 1 x User manual; Free technical support for assistance with any inquiries or issues.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tailored for Your Podcasting and Audio Game Strong Compatibility with PC, Computer, Laptop, iPhone, Smartphone, iPad, PS 4&5. (TYPE-C ADAPTER & USB ADAPTER FOR IPHONE INCLUDE)

Professional Condenser Microphone No fixed angle restrictions Flexible and Sturdy Mic: 360-Degree Rotation and Weighted Base for Ideal Audio Output. Stylish LED Indicator Total Control at Your Fingertips: Mic with Mute, Volume, Adjustable Echo, and Mic Volume for Optimal Monitoring. No-Latency Monitor Immersive Voice Recording: No-Latency Monitoring and On-board Volume Control for Personalized Atmosphere. Noise Cancel Mode The noise-canceling function is initially off. Press and hold the mute button until it turns blue to activate noise cancel.

Seamless Compatibility: Connect All Your Devices with Ease This microphone comes with a USB adapter for use with iPhone and iPad Pro (iPhone 5 onwards and fourth-generation iPad onwards), as well as a Type-C adapter for use with all Type-C devices. And It is compatible with PS4, PS4 Pro, PS5, desktop computers, and laptops.

A microphone for all of your needs The noise-canceling function is initially disabled. To activate advanced noise cancellation, press and hold the mute button until it turns blue. Content creators, musicians, journalists, gamers, and anyone else in need of a noise-free recording environment can activate this feature.

What is the pickup pattern of this microphone? Top-addressed cardioid pickup, you will need to position it with the top of the microphone facing towards the sound source when using it. Make sure to speak directly into the top of the microphone, as this will provide the best sound quality. Why does it not work with my Android phone but function well with my iPhone 15? Please ensure that your Android device supports OTG and verify that it's enabled in the settings before use. (Search for "OTG" in the settings and enable it.) Is the mic compatible with the Mac book? The mic is compatible with Macbook and doesn't require any additional drivers. Make sure to check your Mac settings and ensure that the mic is recognized as an input source. As an ASMR artist, I am experiencing excessive noise with this microphone, how can you help me resolve it? The noise-canceling function is OFF by default. To activate noise cancel, press and hold the mute button until it turns blue. What is the recommended distance to keep when using this desktop cardioid microphone? The recommended distance to keep when using this microphone is generally between 6 to 12 inches from your mouth. But it's best to experiment with different distances to find the optimal one for your needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Mic is Amazing!
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for an inexpensive but good quality microphone to do some live videos and podcasts. I searched high and low and found this microphone. Let me tell you, this microphone is all you need. The sound quality is amazing. It is perfect for ASMR. This Mic has a few settings to dial in your voice and volume for your headphones. The set up was so easy, I just plugged it into my phone using the adapter for my Samsung and boom, it worked. It also has a plug for headphones. I did not have to go anything but plug them in and everything worked perfectly. If you are looking for inexpensive goods quality microphones you need to try this one. You will not be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Microphone Value
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t sure what to expect for an in expensive microphone, but took a chance after reading reviews and pulling a the trigger. I have YT channel and was using a headset/microphone with mediocre results. I was not disappointed! The functionality and great and the provided windscreen works nicely.It was a plug and go set up and the sound quality is very good. For what the microphone costs, you won’t be let down and it perfect for the the basics of adding voice over to your videos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Update 7/10/2023: the customer service contacted me and sent me a replacement. Looks like initially I have received a defective item, but the replacement works amazingly. It does a great job with recording wind instruments. The gain control is very handy. I put it at 25% when recording the flute and increase it to 50% when I’m talking. It’s great at noise cancellation. With my settings, it looks like it is picking up sounds in 2 feet radius from it. It’s perfect for my needs.Original: This microphone picks up every noise in the room. The MIC control nob is so useless. It won't pick up anything until it is at 1/4th level. once you go beyond that, it pick up every sound. I don't know what's the point of that design.If you want a Blue Yeti look a like. This is the one to get but the sounds quality is not comparable to Blue Yeti.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Sound Quality and User-Friendly Design - The Perfect USB Microphone!
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)The ZealSound USB Microphone is an outstanding choice for anyone in need of a high-quality microphone for their computer, whether for gaming, podcasting, streaming, or recording vocals. This plug-and-play condenser microphone offers exceptional sound performance, a user-friendly design, and hassle-free setup, making it a must-have for content creators and gamers alike.First and foremost, the sound quality produced by this microphone is truly impressive. The condenser capsule captures rich and crystal-clear audio, ensuring that every word, note, or sound effect is recorded with utmost precision. Whether you're a professional streamer or a casual gamer, the ZealSound USB Microphone delivers professional-grade sound that enhances the overall quality of your content and provides an immersive experience for your audience.Setting up the microphone is an absolute breeze. It's a plug-and-play device, meaning you can simply connect it to your computer via the USB port and start using it right away. There's no need for any additional drivers or software installations, saving you time and frustration. The microphone is compatible with both Windows and Mac operating systems, offering seamless integration with your preferred setup.The user-friendly design of the ZealSound USB Microphone further enhances its appeal. The adjustable tripod stand provides stability and flexibility, allowing you to position the microphone at the perfect angle and height for optimal performance. The sturdy metal construction ensures durability and longevity, making it a reliable companion for years to come. The microphone also features a 360-degree pickup pattern, capturing sound from all directions and eliminating the need for precise positioning.Another notable feature of this microphone is its excellent noise cancellation capabilities. The built-in cardioid pickup pattern effectively reduces background noise and focuses on capturing the main sound source. Whether you're recording vocals in a noisy environment or engaging in intense gaming sessions, the ZealSound USB Microphone ensures that your voice remains clear and distinct, without any unwanted distractions.Versatility is another key strength of this microphone. Apart from being an exceptional choice for gaming and streaming, it also excels in recording vocals, podcasts, voice-overs, and conference calls. Its wide frequency response and sensitivity ensure that every nuance of your voice is captured, resulting in professional-grade recordings. The microphone's versatility makes it a valuable addition to any content creator's arsenal.Additionally, the ZealSound USB Microphone comes with a practical mute button conveniently located on the front of the microphone. This allows you to instantly mute or unmute the microphone with a simple press, providing you with greater control and flexibility during your recording sessions or gaming sessions.In conclusion, the ZealSound USB Microphone is a top-tier microphone that delivers exceptional sound quality, hassle-free setup, and a user-friendly design. Its plug-and-play functionality, outstanding noise cancellation, versatile applications, and convenient mute button make it the perfect choice for gamers, streamers, podcasters, and content creators of all levels of expertise. If you're in search of a reliable and high-performing USB microphone, look no further than the ZealSound USB Microphone. It's a true game-changer that will elevate your audio experience to new heights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great microphone, should've come unscrewed from the stand, troublesome to unscrew
reviews.reviewText: Tldr: A great budget option as long as you're not looking for something extremely professional.--I usually keep the microphone about a feet away from me due to how my desk is situated, and it still picks up my voice without too many problems. I only use it for the occasional Discord or Zoom call though, and maybe a Twitch stream here or there, I can't say if it's good for gaming or recording.Some breakdowns:Quality: You can hear yourself just fine, but it's not like super crisp quality or anything. Just slightly above average good enough to use type.Background noises: I do not hear any keyboard or mouse click noises from the mic, so this is pretty decent. If you like bang the table or something it'll still pick up a bit though.Multiple voices: It definitely picks up voices very well. I have a noisier house and it would pick up other people's voices as long as they're in the vicinity.Music: It might not pick up music too well, I tried playing some music off my phone and it took a bit before it adjusted to pick up the music & even then it was def at a lower volume than my voice even though I literally placed my phone right in front of it. This doesn't really say much if ur playing live instruments though cuz I can't test that.
Atendeu muito a minha necessidade no homeoffice. Captação de áudio excelente e abafa bem os ruídos.

I used to have a small recording company, so I understand sound equipment and the costs/expectations associated fairly well. This product exceeded my expectations.Given the changes in the world, I have more virtual meetings now. As a result, I've decided to upgrade my desk and decided a budget-friendly mic like this would serve me well. The setup is extremely easy; you just plug it in. Mics like this used to require a separate piece of equipment to make them work, so this is brilliant. I also tested to see if this did work on my phone and how easy that would be. Again, it's simply a plug-in and play. Brilliant.The sound quality is not that of a pro recording studio, but it's PRETTY FANTASTIC! I did not expect much, but this sound is actually really good (for the price). I wouldn't say the range is strong enough to use for vocal/music recordings, but for audio (meetings, gaming, streaming, etc), it's brilliant. Comparing this sound to the wireless phone mics you find; is night and day. This quality is levels above that.Overall, this is a brilliant product & if you are in need of a quality mic at a budget-friendly cost, this is like the mic for you.
Very simple and sleek mic, easy to setup and use.Great sound pickup and you don’t have to be that close for good audio quality.For the price and quality, it beats the rest on Amazon.
Produto muito bom para o que se propõe superou as expectativas inclusive controle de eco. Usamos para streamer , cantar . Não temos estúdio, mas ele consegue ajudar muito !!
The picture showed a lightening cable. But inside the package there was only a usb c adapter not an adapter to plug into iPhone with lightening cable. Poor quality control or false advertising
